item.description:
About me

Iâ€™m a python backend developer (but knowledgeable in other languages and technologies as well). A fan of static typing and high quality code (so I use wemake-python-styleguide and mypy with a set of formatters for each personal project).

Projects

FastAPI RealWorld Example Application - Backend logic implementation for realworld with awesome FastAPI.

EdgeQL Queries - Simple EdgeQL in Python.

unasyncer - CLI to “unasync” your python code.

Mirumon - An open-source computer monitoring service.

pybotx - A little python library for building bots for Express messenger.

Contributions

FastAPI - FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready for production.

Tortoise ORM - Familiar asyncio ORM for python, built with relations in mind.

HTTPX - A next generation HTTP client for Python.

Skills

Python

  • Dependency management: Poetry
  • Backend: FastAPI, AioHTTP, Django
  • Databases: SQLAlchemy core + Databases + Alembic, Tortoise-ORM + asyncpg, pypika
  • Linters: mypy, wemake-python-styleguide
  • Style: Black, isort, autoflake
  • Testing: pytest
  • Other: Python/C API, Cython, PyO3

CI/CD

  • CI/CD providers: CircleCI, GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions
  • Deployment: Docker, Traefik

Other

  • PostgreSQL
  • Redis
  • RabbitMQ
  • JS: TS, Vue.js, Dart(Flutter)
  • Rust: tokio, actix
  • Go
